document.full_text: internet video firm hulu is planning to reduce the size of its board in an attempt to streamline decision-making within the venture, the wall street journal said, citing people familiar with the plan.
document.title: hulu plans to shrink its board: report
lines_and_colors: internet video firm hulu is planning to reduce the size of its board in an attempt to streamline decision-making within the venture, the wall street journal said, citing people familiar with the plan.
